verses.verse: And I, brothers, <WG80> could <WG1410> not speak <WG2980> to you as to spiritual, <WG4152> but as to carnal, <WG4559> even as to babes <WG3516> in Christ. <WG5547>

I have <WG2192> fed <WG4222> you with milk, <WG1051> and not with meat: <WG1033> for till now <WG3768> you were not able <WG1410> to bear it, neither <WG235> <WG3777> yet <WG2089> now <WG3568> are you able. <WG1410>

For you are yet <WG2089> carnal: <WG4559> for whereas <WG3699> there is among <WG1722> you envying, <WG2205> and strife, <WG2054> and divisions, <WG1370> are you not carnal, <WG4559> and walk <WG4043> as men? <WG444>
For while <WG3752> one <WG5100> said, <WG3004> I am <WG1510> of Paul; and another, <WG2087> I am of Apollos; <WG625> are you not carnal? <WG4559>

Who <WG5101> then <WG3767> is Paul, and who <WG5101> is Apollos, <WG625> but ministers <WG1249> by whom <WG3739> you believed, <WG4100> even <WG2532> as the Lord <WG2962> gave <WG1325> to every <WG1538> man?
I have <WG2192> planted, <WG5452> Apollos <WG625> watered; <WG4222> but God <WG2316> gave the increase. <WG837>
So <WG5620> then neither <WG3777> is he that plants <WG5452> any <WG5100> thing, neither <WG3777> he that waters; <WG4222> but God <WG2316> that gives the increase. <WG837>

Now <WG1161> he that plants <WG5452> and he that waters <WG4222> are one: <WG1520> and every <WG1538> man shall receive <WG2983> his own <WG2398> reward <WG3408> according <WG2596> to his own <WG2398> labor. <WG2873>
For we are laborers <WG4904> together <WG4904> with God: <WG2316> you are God's <WG2316> husbandry, <WG1091> you are God's <WG2316> building. <WG3619>

According <WG2596> to the grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> which <WG3588> is given <WG1325> to me, as a wise <WG4680> master builder, <WG753> I have <WG2192> laid <WG5087> the foundation, <WG2310> and another <WG243> builds <WG2026> thereon. <WG2026> But let every <WG1538> man take heed <WG991> how <WG4459> he builds <WG2026> thereupon. <WG2026>
For other <WG243> foundation <WG2310> can <WG1410> no <WG3762> man <WG3762> lay <WG5087> than <WG3844> that is laid, <WG5087> which <WG3739> is Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>

Now <WG1161> if <WG1487> any <WG5100> man build <WG2026> on this <WG5126> foundation <WG2310> gold, <WG5557> silver, <WG696> precious <WG5093> stones, <WG3037> wood, <WG3586> hay, <WG5528> stubble; <WG2562>

Every <WG1538> man's work <WG2041> shall be made <WG1096> manifest: <WG5318> for the day <WG2250> shall declare <WG1213> it, because <WG3754> it shall be revealed <WG601> by fire; <WG4442> and the fire <WG4442> shall try <WG1381> every <WG1538> man's work <WG2041> of what <WG3697> sort <WG3697> it is.
If <WG1487> any <WG1536> man's work <WG2041> abide <WG3306> which <WG3739> he has built <WG2026> thereupon, <WG2026> he shall receive <WG2983> a reward. <WG3408>

If <WG1487> any <WG1536> man's work <WG2041> shall be burned, <WG2618> he shall suffer <WG2210> loss: <WG2210> but he himself <WG846> shall be saved; <WG4982> yet <WG1161> so <WG3779> as by fire. <WG4442>
Know <WG1492> you not that you are the temple <WG3485> of God, <WG2316> and that the Spirit <WG4151> of God <WG2316> dwells <WG3611> in you?

If <WG1487> any <WG1536> man defile <WG5351> the temple <WG3485> of God, <WG2316> him shall God <WG2316> destroy; <WG5351> for the temple <WG3485> of God <WG2316> is holy, <WG40> which <WG3748> temple you are.

Let no <WG3367> man <WG3367> deceive <WG1818> himself. <WG1438> If <WG1487> any <WG1536> man among <WG1722> you seems <WG1380> to be wise <WG4680> in this <WG5129> world, <WG165> let him become <WG1096> a fool, <WG3474> that he may be wise. <WG4680>
For the wisdom <WG4678> of this <WG5127> world <WG2889> is foolishness <WG3472> with God. <WG2316> For it is written, <WG1125> He takes <WG1405> the wise <WG4680> in their own craftiness. <WG3834>
And again, <WG3825> The Lord <WG2962> knows <WG1097> the thoughts <WG1261> of the wise, <WG4680> that they are vain. <WG3152>
Therefore <WG5620> let no <WG3367> man <WG3367> glory <WG2744> in men. <WG444> For all <WG3956> things are your's; <WG5216>

Whether <WG1535> Paul, or <WG1535> Apollos, <WG625> or <WG1535> Cephas, <WG2786> or <WG1535> the world, <WG2889> or <WG1535> life, <WG2222> or <WG1535> death, <WG2288> or <WG1535> things present, <WG1764> or <WG1535> things to come; <WG3195> all <WG3956> are your's; <WG5216>
And you are Christ's; <WG5547> and Christ <WG5547> is God's. <WG2316>
